code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function SareeList(){const[sarees,setSarees]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const BASE_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_API_BASE_URL;fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"/sarees/")).then(res=>res.json()).then(data=>setSarees(data)).catch(err=>console.error("Error fetching sarees:",err));},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{fontFamily:"'Poppins', sans-serif"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{style:{backgroundImage:"url('/banner1.png')",backgroundSize:"cover",backgroundPosition:"center",color:"#fff",textAlign:"center",padding:"5rem 1rem",borderRadius:"10px",marginBottom:"3rem",position:"relative"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{backgroundColor:"rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.45)",position:"absolute",inset:0,borderRadius:"10px"}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{position:"relative",zIndex:1},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{style:{fontSize:"2.7rem",fontWeight:"700",color:"#fffaf5"},children:"Subhadra Handlooms"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{style:{fontSize:"1.15rem",color:"#ffe9d6"},children:"Authentic Odisha Handlooms \u2728"})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:"collection",className:"product-list",children:sarees.map(saree=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/saree/".concat(saree.id),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:saree.image,alt:saree.name,className:"product-image",onError:e=>e.target.src="https://via.placeholder.com/300"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:saree.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"price",children:["\u20B9",saree.price]})]},saree.id))})]});}export default SareeList;
